title: Did the United States millionaire receive $1.7 million in COVID-19 stimulus checks?
subtitle: This is approximately 1,400 times the amount that a low-income worker will receive from the Federal Government ' s Economic Relief Package under the COVID-19 initiative.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Each US million will receive an average of $1.7 million in stimulus payments through the Corona HIV Aid, Relief and Economic Security Act of March 2020.
